text: Devender Kumar Nim is an Indian politician. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party. He is a member of Seventeenth Legislative Assembly of Uttar Pradesh representing the Rampur Maniharan constituency. Nim is 47 years old (2017). ==Political career== Nim has been a member of the 17th Legislative Assembly of Uttar Pradesh. Since 2017, he has represented the Rampur Maniharan and is a member of the Bhartiya Janata Party. in 2017 elections he defeating Bahujan Samaj Party candidate Ravinder Kumar Molhu by a margin of 595 votes. ==Posts held== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! # !! title: Devendra Kumar Nim
